page.title: 01A FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: A Family Weekend {Saturday}Mum and Dad both get up at about ten past nine.Next they have a coffee.Then Dad goes and lets Snowy(our dog) out.Snowy and Dad walk up to Granny's.Dad works on the farm with his two brothers,Ron and Jim Cooper.Dad never has breakfast on Saturdays and Sundays,but Mum does. Mum and my eldest sister,Julie do the house work.At eleven o'clock Mum goes up to Granny's in the car.Whosever turn it is to go the shop at Waddingham will go with Mum and Granny to the general store in the car.Then we go to the butcher's and to the fish shop.Sometimes we go to Scunthorpe for the week's shopping.At night we all go for a ride in the car.Mum and Dad don't usually get to bed until eleven o'clock.
